userMenu.confirmAccountDeletion: Na pewno? Usunięcie konta usunie Twoje wydarzenia.
userMenu.webhookTooltip: Możesz dodać URL na któy będą wysyłane powiadomienia o zmianach w Twoim wydarzeniu - na przykład na serwer Discorda czy kanał na slacku.

signIn.passwordRestoreTitle: Nie martw się, wszystkim nam się to zdarza.
signIn.passwordRestoreAction: Wyślij mi email z tymczasowym hasłem

validations.passwordMin: - min. 5 znaki, w tym duża litera i liczba

homeInfo: All you need is an account to create an event. You can start with a title and your name, with optional description, and you're good to go.

With your event created, you will be able to share a link with your friends to choose days and see which one suits you all the most, describe the time you have available, and easily keep track of when others could join you. As an owner you can also choose whether to receive email or webhook notifications when attendees update their data, and select the final date when your group will meet.
homeCTA: Sign up to create and participate in events!
homeNull: You need to create an event first
homeLinkInfo: This is a link to your event. Send it to your group members to determine the best date for a meeting. That's where you can specify your own potential attendance, and where you can choose final event date(s).
name: Your name
cookieInfo: But you'll nevertheless need to confirm that you accept them for this to work out. They will only ever be used to keep you logged in.

popupInfo.passwordRestore: Check your email for more information
popupInfo.errorGeneric: Something went wrong - please try again later.
popupInfo.errorNoEventUpdate: No change in your event detected.
popupInfo.errorUsernameTaken: Username already taken, please choose another
popupInfo.errorEmailTaken: Account with this email already exists
popupInfo.errorNotSignedIn: You need to be signed in to participate
popupInfo.errorNoCookieConsent: You need to accept cookie use first
